value_i18n.ar_SA:
For Business Sales and Technical Presales Job Roles:
A new, role-based sales certification program will launch for partners to maintain the minimum number of trained and certified presales and sales staff in accordance with their partner level. 

For Technical Job Roles:
A new Liferay Practitioner certification program will launch for staff who are in technical support, software or sales engineering, or developer roles. As the first component of technical practitioner certification, the required headcount will need to attend and pass the in-person partner bootcamp with its exercises (taking place from May 2024 to September 2024.)

What this means for your team:

  • Sales & Presales: Watch for information on the new certification program and how to complete it within the 12-month window.
  • Technical Staff: Get ready for the partner bootcamps, which will be easiest path towards technical certification. Training and registration information will be available soon. Later this year, after the bootcamp sessions have concluded, there will be an option to take a certification exam through a third party testing service. More details and cost for that exam will be published soon.  
  • On-Demand Resources: Prepare now by watching the Learning Path recordings for Business Sales, Technical Sales, and Practitioner sessions.
